title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Digital Methodologies and Feminist Research Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and understanding of data collection methods
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ethical considerations (e.g., consent, participation, representational politics) in the digital data collection process
Learners can apply a care-centered approach to science project design to develop research topics
Learners can conduct critical discussions on the societal impact of digital methodologies through team-based workshops
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
